title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell
OB: When trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: The export process should be successful without any exceptions when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a grid. 
2. Perform the necessary steps to export data in a table that is inside one of the grid cells.
